compound: CBD oral vs Celecoxib (COX-2 inhibitor) head-to-head
effect_size: Large for both (CBD: d=1.14; Celecoxib: d=1.06)
notes: Cannabidiol vs Celecoxib for Osteoarthritis Pain: Non-Inferiority Trial
abstract: CBD: 44% reduction (61.3 → 34.3); Celecoxib: 41% reduction (60.8 → 35.9); Non-inferiority proven (margin 10%, p=0.018)
